actionCalls.name: Send_Custom_Notification_to_Working_Group
actionCalls.label: Send Custom Notification to Working Group

choices.name: No_I_want_to_save_and_revisit_my_work
choices.choiceText: No, I want to save and revisit my work

value.stringValue: No, I want to save and revisit my work

loops.name: Loop_through_the_Working_Group_Members
loops.label: Loop through the Working Group Members

value.stringValue: Please review the related case for approval. Upon approving a it will create a subsequent task for the Division VP
Please provide the URL Link for the Program Guideline template
What type of Award will this be? Grant, Tax credit, Loan, Other?

Start by listing the specific deliverables the program is expected to produce. These are tangible products or services resulting from the program's activities, like reports, events, training sessions, or developed tools. Clearly defining these deliverables is essential for understanding what the program will concretely achieve in the short term.

Define the program outcomes, which are the longer-term impacts of your program. Unlike outputs and deliverables, outcomes reflect changes or benefits resulting from the program, such as improved skills, behavioral changes, or policy impacts.
How long will it take before we can accurately evaluate the outcomes?
How does this program address risk management and threat preparedness at both microeconomic (individual or small-scale) and macroeconomic (national or global scale) levels?
Does WEDC have the necessary skills and resources, at current staffing levels, to successfully implement and sustain this program, or will additional staffing and resources be required?
If yes, please specify the additional resources that are required
How frequently will WEDC report on the progress of this program (performance reporting cadence)?
List the eligibility criteria and what needs to be collected to qualify an eligible activity? When will they be collected?
Eligibility_Item_Collection__c:What needs to be collected to qualify an eligible activity?, Item_Collection_Period__c:When will they be collected?
How will you reach your target audience? - (Marketing, Comms)
Is the program competitive or non-competitive?
If Competitive, please add the scoring criteria
If Competitive, please specify When would be the best time to roll the program out?
If this program is a loan, will there be collateral requirements? What will be the program loss reserve?
If it is a Loan, please specify the collateral requiements

What is the estimated average size of the award? If awards are typically under $100k, payment requests require receipts. If awards typically exceed $100k, will the target awardee market have the sophistication and capability to complete an SOE/IAR?
What are the eligible/ineligible uses of the funds?
How many awards do we expect to contract?
Is this a business or community application?
What addendums will this program need?
Please provide the URL link for the Program Guideline template
Please provide URL Link starting with "https://" eg: https://wedc.org
What type of Award will this be? Grant, Tax credit, Loan, Other?

fields.name: SaveWork
fields.fieldText: Do you want to submit your work for the Working Group approval?

textTemplates.name: DeliverableOutputText
textTemplates.text:
Identifying Program Deliverables or Outputs: 

  • Start by listing the specific deliverables or outputs the program is expected to produce. These are tangible products or services resulting from the program's activities, like reports, events, training sessions, or developed tools. 
  • Clearly defining these outputs is essential for understanding what the program will concretely achieve in the short term.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Greetings!

We hope this email finds you well.


We are writing to request your review and approval of the related case at your earliest convenience. Your approval is crucial as it will automatically generate a subsequent task, allowing us to proceed with the next steps efficiently.


Please find the details of the case attached for your perusal. If you have any questions or require additional information, do not hesitate to reach out.


  • Program Name: {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c}
  • Program Case URL : https://wedc.lightning.force.com/{!Get_Case_Records.Id}

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.


--Please do not reply to this email--

textTemplates.name: NotificationBody
textTemplates.text: Please review the {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c} case's Investment Development form and complete the task assigned to you. Please add any additional any decision notes in the chatter feed or while completing the task.
